item.title: What am i missing?
item.dc:creator: @DuhPk DuhPk
item.description:
@DuhPk wrote:

if(spellID == 1190) //sara stike { if(playerLevel[6] >= 60) { if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 2415) { if((playerHasItemAmount(554, 2)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(565, 2)==false) || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 2415 || (playerHasItemAmount(556, 4)==false)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); } if((playerHasItemAmount(554, 2)==true) || (playerHasItemAmount(565, 2)==true) || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 2415 || playerEquipment[playerCape] == 2412 || (playerHasItemAmount(2415, 1)==true) || (playerHasItemAmount(556, 4)==true)) { hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(30); castOnPlayer.stillgfx(76, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); deleteItem(4278, getItemSlot(4278), 25); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 59) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 60 to cast this spell."); } else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 2415) sendMessage("You need to be wielding a sara staff to use this spell."); } }
Replace yours with this
Works fine I tested it and all

Read full topic

item.title: What am i missing?
item.dc:creator: @vato vato
item.description:
@vato wrote:

Well i know this is kinda wrong, but i need help to make it right.
im trying to make the spell need the weapon 2415 to cast, but its not working, it just does spell with it, or without.
i know what i have isnt right, but could someone guide me in the correct direction? thanks.

if(spellID == 1190) //sara stike { if(playerLevel[6] >= 60) { if((playerHasItemAmount(554, 2)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(565, 2)==false) || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 2415 || (playerHasItemAmount(556, 4)==false)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); } if((playerHasItemAmount(554, 2)==true) || (playerHasItemAmount(565, 2)==true) || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 2415 || playerEquipment[playerCape] == 2412 || (playerHasItemAmount(2415, 1)==true) || (playerHasItemAmount(556, 4)==true)) { hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(30); castOnPlayer.stillgfx(76, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); deleteItem(4278, getItemSlot(4278), 25); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 59) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 60 to cast this spell."); } }

Read full topic
